Name: BSL Winter Games Challenge
About the game: We are pleased to announce the addition of Split Screen Multiplayer mode for all events in BSL Winter Games Challenge. Local split screen multiplayer mode allows you to compete with family and friends in split screen using two game controllers, or on opposite ends of the keyboard. Game controller assignments are identical to single player mode. *****New speed trail for Snowboard and Skiing, 'Whirlwind Bluff' featuring***** • Next generation scenery. • High speed downhill racing with hairpin turns for best time score. • High jumps to perform tricks for bonus score. • Hidden shortcut tracks, if you can find them!!!!! • It is said the mountain is prone to whirlwinds, so watch out. This new trail adds to the other great features in BSL • Ski Jump - Adapt to changing conditions to set record jump distances • Snowboarding - Challenging freestyle courses • Skiing - Slalom • Bobsled, Luge, and Skeleton racing and challenges • Single and Multi-player options • Supports 15 different languages • 24 separate countries to choose from • Multiple course and skill levels of play. • User settings can be changed to match player’s skill level • Multi-player options allows you to challenge family friends
